sentences.english: But we must remind our comrades that they must truly follow the spirit of the "May 7th Directive".
sentences.chinese: 但要提醒同志們注意，必須真正執行五七指示的精神。

sentences.english: Laura died in nineteen fifty-seven, just after her ninetieth birthday.
sentences.chinese: 勞拉死在一九五七年，就在她90歲生日。

sentences.english: In July of 1957 the underground palace was successfully opened up.
sentences.chinese: 一九五七年七月成功地打開了地下玄宮。

sentences.chinese: 具體內容加QQ二五七二五一詳談。
